workshoptitle: Oracle Enterprise Manager - Hybrid Pluggable Database-as-a-Service

tutorials.title: Introduction
tutorials.description: Introduction to Hybrid Pluggable Database-as-a-Service Workshop

tutorials.title: Lab 1: Prepare Setup
tutorials.description: How to download your ORM stack and update security rules for an existing VCN

tutorials.title: Lab 2: Environment Setup
tutorials.description: How to provision the workshop environment and connect to it

tutorials.title: Lab 3: Hybrid Pluggable Database-as-a-Service
tutorials.description: This lab provides an overview of Hybrid Pluggable database-as-a-service features in Enterprise Manager. It is intended solely to help you assess the business benefits identify the value proposition of using EM Hybrid PDBaaS

tutorials.title: Troubleshoot Enterprise Manager Environment
tutorials.description: How to troubleshoot all the workshop components

tutorials.title: Appendix: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ)
tutorials.description: Frequently Asked Questions (FAQ) you may refer to when troubleshooting issues encountered while executing above labs

tutorials.title: Environment Cleanup
tutorials.description: Cleanly dispose of all OCI resources created by ORM for the workshop, and delete the stack

tutorials.title: Need Help?
tutorials.description: Solutions to Common Problems and Directions for Receiving Live Help
